content: 11sts finishing cut yarn and pull the tail through remaining stitches with a tapestry needle and pull tight i like to weave the yarn through the stitches one more time then bring the tail to the inside and do a couple of back stitches to lock the yarn weave in the remaining tail and the tail from the cast on abbreviations p purl co- cast on pm place marker k knit round round k2tog knit 2 stitches together sts stitches kfb knit in front and back of stitch stitch glossary k1 p1 rib with yarn in back *knit 1 stitch bring yarn to front under the right-hand needle and purl the next stitch bring yarn to back under the right-hand needle* repeat between ** to create the rib pattern k2 decrease insert right-hand needle from front to back through the 2nd stitch and the 1st stitch on the left-hand needle and knit them together kfb - insert right-hand needle into front of stitch as if to knit bring yarn around and pull the stitch through but do not remove the stitch from the left-hand needle insert right-hand needle into back of the same stitch and wrap yarn around from back to front and bring that stitch through then slide stitch off left-hand needle ©copyright 2020 sarah montie handknits po box 178 ih nj 08732 info@sarahmontie com this pattern may not be photocopied or reproduced without written authorization
